content.html: “As an engineer, I am thoroughly disappointed when I don’t get feedback after an interview rejection. I strongly believe companies should give feedback to candidates.” A thread on why most companies don’t do this and which ones actually do:
content.value:
“As an engineer, I am thoroughly disappointed when I don’t get feedback after an interview rejection. I strongly believe companies should give feedback to candidates.”

A thread on why most companies don’t do this and which ones actually do:

content.html:
My template is always. “I am disappointed to hear that, but I respect your decision. I was really impressed with everyone I met. I would love to grow as an engineer and was wondering if you would be open to giving me some feedback”. …
